row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unit" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT#
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 ! check for the leading EXT: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Unit" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT#
errors=0 ! check file existence :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@UNIX &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH#
if [ $EXIST -ne 1 ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# does not exist" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR errors=1 fi
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 exit 100 :ENDIF
if [ "$errors" -gt "0" ]; then exit $errors fi
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
var=`du -sk "&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#" | awk '{print $1}'`
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT# = "BYTE" var=`expr $var \* 1024` :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_UNIT# = "MEGABYTE" var=`expr $var / 1024` :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "result: $var" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process:
:SET &result# = 0
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*result: *") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "result: ")
: IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 8 : SET &result# = MID(&line#, &pos#) : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_SIZE# = &result#
